metadata.title: CVE-2017-12865 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in "dnsproxy.c" in connman 1.34 and earlierallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or executearbitrary code via a crafted response query string passed to the "name"variable.

criterions.comment: connman: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
